choices: It's sunny, must be summer time
the leaves are falling must be fall
There's a foot of snow on the ground, must be Winter
Flowers are growing, It's Spring time.
1.content:
Somewhere in the Midwest of the United States, a small community was growing into a small town named Glendale. A town that did not have very much to offer, jobs were okay and education was doing well also. It was a very small tight community, where everyone got along and crime was low. On one side of town there was nothing but woods and plants. On the other side there were train tracks, which are nothing special. There really wasn't anything wrong with the community. This town had everything, from a store to a movie theater. The only thing that made this town any different was that there was no big city for miles. Meaning that around this town was the woods and train tracks.

Now the begin the story

The sun was just beginning to rise in Glendale. The sun was aim right into the 14 year old room. The 14 year old happens to be Kate. She was just sleeping away with no alarm on, because it was the weekend. Kate started to stir and wake up, but something other then the sun was waking her up. It turns out to be her dog that was jumping up and down on the bed. “uhhhhhh Fred get off of me”Kate said putting her head into the pillow. When she tried to go back to sleep Fred her Dog poked his paw into her side, causing her to jump. “hahhaahha fred, Ok OK im up” Kate said getting up from her sleep. Kate got up and stretch and just as she is about to look outside. She gets jumped from behind.

"What the" Kate says falling to the ground. It turnout to be her sister Kelly who is 12 years old. "Kelly get off" , as Kelly had pinned Kate to the ground. " Kelly stop it, get off me" Kate trying to get free. "I got you now big sis, time for your punishment" Kelly said a smiling grin on her face.

Kate was pinned and her arms were trapped under Kelly's thighs. Kate try and try to wiggle to get free but it was no use. With all the wiggling and moving Kate accidentally pushed her pajama tank top up exposing part of her midriff and her navel. " you know what big sis, I always wondering why you wear crop tops and tank tops to expose her belly, but I Guess I figure it out" "nooooooooo Kelly you can't" "I can't what", as Kelly showing started to wave her fingers behind her back. "NOOOOOOOOOOOMPPHHHHHH" Kate said as Kelly put her right hand over her Kate's mouth. "now I know big sister doesn't want to wake mommy and daddy, now does she" Kelly said tickling Kate side and running circles around her belly and her Navel. "HAHAHAMPHHHHAOHA" is all Kate manged to get out as the tickling continued.

Kelly continued the tickle torture on Kate ticklish belly and Navel. Kate was drawing circles with her finger and drilling it into Kate's navel. "That's Kate laugh for me" Kelly said she was wiggle fingers like a feather on her sister's poor belly. the punishment lasted for a good 20 minutes until Kate was red in the face.

"MPHI GIVE UP" Kate said red in face. Kelly stopped the tickle torture to let her sister have a rest. "OK I think you have had enough of a punishment today" as Kelly gave one last tickle to she exposed side. Kelly got off Kate, and Kate just lay there as Kelly walk out of the room. Kate got up to stretch and to look out side to see what ______time of year it was.

What time of year.
1.title: Every story as a beginning

choices: The Carnival fill of rides with surprises
Go to a friends house for the day
11.content:
Looking outside Kate saw that it was summertime, which meant that it was summer vacation. There was no school and she had all the free time in the world to do what she wanted.

"Kids breakfast is ready" Kate's mom said as Kate was just leaving her room. Kelly and Kate ran downstairs to go get Breakfast. Kate's parents were downstairs around the dinner table with Breakfast ready to be served.

So they went on to eat Breakfast. Kate's mom asked "any plans for the summer, now that school is out".

"not sure yet, mom" Kate said grabbing a plate. With it being summer time, it was the time of year were carnivals, festivals, family vacations were happening. "I was thinking maybe we could take a family vacation somewhere" mom said.

Kate's dad noticed that some of Kate's midriff was showing and gave her Kate a quick poke in her bare side. "hahahah, DAD" " why in the world must you wear small shirts Kate" Kate's dad said poking her in the side. "you know you leave your self vulnerable to tickling" "hahah I know dad hahah, the style is what is in hahha" Kate laughing, as her dad was probing and poking her side and midriff.

"so about that family vacation, what do you guys think" dad said, with tickling his ticklish daughter midriff. "Im down"Kelly said. "Im was thinking about doing something else, I would be down later in the summer" Kate said.

After they finished their breakfast, Kate ran upstairs to take a shower and to get ready for the adventures that awaited her. After getting done with her shower, she ran to her closet to pick out a outfit. "can't decide what to wear" as Kate was going through each shirt. Then she saw it, a crop top that was made to show her midriff. It was a crop top that was shredded from just above her belly button, and just her ribs. "perfect" she said as she put it on, letting midriff be exposed to the world.

So whats next for are ticklish adventure?
11.title: It's sunny, must be summer time

114.content:
After texting with her friend Erin, Kate decides to walk over to her house. After all, Erinâ€™s family has a pool and her parents are out of town, so they can enjoy the whole day there, working on their summer tans by the pool, talking about boys, and perhaps playfully tickling each other at times (since her pal Erin is almost as ticklish as Kate, though in different spots on her body). Erin texts back saying to bring her bikini and some sleeper wear, in case Kate wants to spend the night. One thing leads to another, and soon Kate has her little sister in tow, too, and they both walk the few blocks over to Erinâ€™s house.

         Once there, the two living dolls just walk right in to their friendâ€™s house, since they are regulars there, and they hear the sweet laughter of their friend Erin coming from:
114.title: Visit her friend Erin

choices: go to a haunted house with friends
12.content:
As Kate got to the window, she noticed that the leaves were changing which meant that it was fall outside. After looking outside for a bit. She took a shower and changed into a small sweatshirt and jeans and went downstairs.

When she got downstairs she noticed that her sister Kelly was gone along with her parents. Then she look on the dining room table, which a note was from her parents.

Kate,

When to the store to go shopping to get Halloween stuff to decorate the house.
Be back later today.

PS. one of are close neighbors wanted to ask you if you wanted to make some money babysitting, there youngest daughter Lucy sometime during the week or even today. Here the number if you want the job:
679-547-1514

Mom, Dad, and Kelly.

"OK cool" Kate said putting the note and thinking about what she was going to do today.

Now with it being fall there is usually Halloween parties, fall festivals, and haunted houses to go to or she can just babysit today.

What's next for are young ticklish teen.
12.title: Autumn is in the air

125.content:
After her parents left, Kate sat down on the couch for a moment.

She looked at her watch. Time was 10:00 a.m.

Kate sighed. She was looking forward to a relaxing day, but something was weighing in the back of her mind.

Volleyball.

Open tryouts were at school beginning Monday and she was nowhere near prepared. She'd told herself a dozen times a week that she would begin her running and lifting regime, but never got around to it. Now at home, all alone, with absolutely nothing to do, it became harder for her to delay it. She knew if she didn't run at least today and tomorrow, she'd be too winded to keep up.

Resigning herself, Kate went upstairs and changed into her running gear. She could still feel the cool fall air coming in through her bedroom window. Not quite cold enough for running pants. She'd go with shorts, t-shirt and long sleeve sweatshirt over.

Unfortunately, the only sweatshirt available in her closet was to small. Laundry day was today. Selection was limited.

Kate put the sweatshirt on over her t-shirt, pulled up her shorts and laced her shoes. She stood in front of the mirror to stretch.

Sure enough when she raised her arms, the small sweatshirt grabbed the bottom of her t-shirt and rose above her bellybutton. She hated wearing this sweatshirt. Every time she did and stretched, anyone within arms length would scratch her belly.

Annoyed her to no end.

Well hopefully no one will be out today.

Kate rushed downstairs and out into the cool autumn morning. She locked the door behind her, put her key in her pocket and began to jog.

Heading into her neighborhood, she veered quickly towards her right to the woods. There was a biker's path in there that the neighborhood always used for bike rides and long runs. It was a five mile looping path that led deep into the forest. Perfect for mornings like this. No cars to worry about, no bratty kids.

Kate headed into the path and picked up her pace.

About two miles or so into the path, a strange noise hit her hears.

It sounded like................
125.title: Go for a Run

1251.content:
....................hysterical laughter.

Kate crept quietly down the path. Where was it coming from?

She wandered straight down the path for a quarter mile before she saw two pairs of shoes and socks tossed casually on the side of the path.

The laughter was louder now.

It wasn't coming from the path, but off to the right side.

Kate grew apprehensive.

Should she keep going on her run or investigate?
1251.title: Laughter

12511.content:
By now she was able to distinguish words that were yelled in the brief interruptions of the hysterical laughter. "Nooooohoooo not theeehereee" or "Pleeeease sttttooooooooop". Kate's mind raced between shock and curiosity. What was going on in this isolated place at this time of the day. Usually she would only encounter hedgehogs or possibly a deer. The voices sounded like someone her age, kids certainly, but at this high pitch impossible to distinguish whether male or female.

Probably she should run and call the police. Kate knew that the mobile phone network did not work properly in those woods. Police needed evidence, right? But what would she tell the policemen when they arrived and found nothing but silence in the woods?

The girl grabbed the socks and sneakers, one pair with a shade of pink that a boy would not buy or wear, hesitated and continued to run on the path. Maybe she should contact some of her friends instead to help her investigate?

Did she make it out of the woods?
12511.title: Run

12512.content:
It was too strange not too look. She had to find out.

Crouching low, she moved off the path and into the woods. The sound of the laughter guided her about one hundred yards into the thick forest.

There she could see three muscular women in sports bras and yoga pants. There were two others she couldn't quite see who were laughing hysterically.

Luckily there was a rock wall nearby that provided perfect cover. Ducking behind it, Kate peered to see what the source of the laughter was.

To her shock, she saw.............
12512.title: Investigate

125122.content:
................two people.

The three muscular women were surrounding two tied up people. Two identical trees were holding them. Each captive was tied to a tree, arms raised above their heads and their feet a few inches from the ground. Feet were bare.

One of the muscular women was kneeling down and tickling a foot for each person. That was the laughter source.

The person on the left tree was female. She was dressed in black yoga pants and a gray sweatshirt. That sweatshirt was pulled over her head to cover her eyes, showing off her bright pink sports bra, and bare armpits and belly.

The person on the right tree was male. He was in jeans and a black sweater. The black sweater was pulled over his head as well, leaving his entire torso bare.

Both captives could be heard laughing hysterically through their sweaters as they feet and toes were tortured and tickled.

One of the muscular women who was standing turned to the other one beside her.

"Katrina. Help Annie with their feet."

Katrina nodded and knelt beside her companion. Annie moved to the man's feet. Katrina to the woman's. Now all four feet were being tickled.

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHA" the woman laughed, "HAHAHAH ANONONOTBOTHFEET HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

The muscular woman standing smiled sadistically.

"I know you two saw us robbing the Sanderson house. Annie and Katrina spotted you! You're gonna tell us what you know now!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHWE DONT KNOW ANYTHING EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE" the man giggled.

"Oh yes you do! You do and you'll give us up if we let you go!

"HAHAHAHAHHEHEHEHHEHEHHEHHOHOHOHHAHAHHEHHEHEHEHWE DONT KNOW ANYTHING HAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH"

"HAHHAHAHAHEHHEHEHEHEHEHAHEHEHEHEHEHE LET US GO HAAHHHHAHHAHAHAHAHAHA!"

The standing muscular woman rubbed her chin thoughtfully. She wasn't convinced. It'd be too risky to believe them. After all, she was sure the three of them had planned everything out perfectly. They'd waited until the right moment when the Sandersons left. Bypassed the alarms. Gotten in and out in seconds! It was flawless.

Then they saw the couple on the walking path. They had to have figured the trio out.

Luckily they'd caught them.

Annie and Katrina delicately scribbled their fingers on the flailing feet. The two captives were nearly breathless with laughter, but adamant that they had not seen anything.

Again the standing muscular woman was not convinced.

"Annie. Katrina. Stop for a second."

Obediently the tickling stopped. The captives breathed heavily.

Annie turned to the standing woman.

"What do you think Brooke? Should we let them go?"

Brooke shook her head.

"I think I'm not convinced yet. I think we need to pick things up."

The captive woman winced.

"Wha-what do you mean?"

Brooke grinned and moved closer to the captives. Her eyes moved from their bare feet up to their bare bellies and armpits.

She laughed.

"I think we need to move to........................"
125122.title: A man and a woman

1251221.content:
..............another spot!"

Turning to her friends, Brooke snapped her fingers.

"Girls. Get their tummies!"

"Oh no!" the man gasped, "Not my belly! Not there!"

"Please!" the woman begged.

It was no use.

Annie plunged her digits into the man's pale, chubby belly sending him into hysterical laughter, while Katrina gleefully dug into the woman's tanned tummy.

"HAHAHAHAHAHHHEHHEHEHEHEHHAHAHAHAHHAHEHHEHEHEHHAHAHHAHAHA!"

Brooke grinned at their laughter. If they knew anything, this would surely push them over the edge. Annie was enjoying herself as she played with the man's sides and ribs. Her fingers scratched his ticklish skin with great effect.

This was truly his most ticklish spot.

"AHAHAHAHAHAHAHANONONOHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAI'MTOOTICKLISHHAHAHHEHEHEHEH EHHEHHEHEHH!"

Katrina, not to be outdone, kicked her tickling into higher gear. The woman had more defined abs than her companion and Katrina found that her light wiggling fingers were driving her ticklee insane.

"EHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEHEH EH!"

As the tummy tickling continued, Brooke spoke again.

"Well you two?" she asked. "Are you going to confess?!"
1251221.title: Their Bellies

12512211.content:
"Yes hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha. I'll tell. I'll tell heheheehehheheeheheheheheheheh!"

It was the man who broke first.

With a snap of Brooke's fingers, Annie and Katina backed away from the two bare bellies, leaving their captives heaving and panting.

Brooke let them breathe for a second before asking.

"Well? I'm waiting."

"We saw you come out of the house," the man admitted, "with all that stuff under your arms."

"Do you remember our faces?"

Silence.

Brooke motioned to Annie to move back over and start tickling again. Annie dug furiously into the man's bare sides sending him into hysterical laughter again.

"OHOHAHAHAHEHHEHEHEHHEHAHAHAHAHA STOP STOP HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH"

"Do YOU REMEMBER?"

"HAHAHHAHAHAHAH YES YES I REMEMBER HAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA"

Brooke motioned for Annie to stop. Annie complied and backed away.

Now Brooke moved towards the tied up woman. She motioned for Katina to begin tickling her.

"How about you sweetheart?"

Silence.

Katina tickled the woman's tight abs, causing her to wiggle and giggle hysterically.

"OHNO HEHEHEHEHEHHEAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAA"

"How about you?!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAH YES YES I REMEMBER HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHH"

Katina stopped. Brooke shook her head.

"You two can ID us. No way we can let you go. You're gonna have to come with us."

She turned to Annie.

"Annie bring the car to the cul-de-sac. Katina you go with her. I'm gonna need you to bring the extra rope in the back so we can tie these two up tighter."

Both girls nodded and headed off to carry out their orders.

This just left Brooke standing guard in front of the two captives. Kate peered over the hedge and saw that Brooke's back was to her.

She couldn't leave those two to be tickled to death. She had to do something.

But what?
12512211.title: Yes!

125122112.content:
A diversion! If she could get Brooke away from those two for a minute, Kate could untie them.

But how?

Searching near her, Kate spots a small rock. That gives her an idea.

Creeping ever so carefully over to it, Kate snatches it and heaves it far off into the distance.

The rock falls with a faint "Crack."

That grabs Brooke's attention.

She takes a few steps over in the direction the rock went.

Was it her imagination?

Kate finds and hurls a second rock. Brooke rubs her chin thoughtfully. She couldn't take chances if someone else is out there.

She decides to investigate.

But first, she decides to give her captives a little reminder of something.

"All right you two," Brooke orders, "I'm gonna check out that sound. I don't wanna hear a peep from either of you. Is that clear?"

The two captives nod.

Brooke sports a devilish smile. She wiggles her fingers on the man and woman's ribs.

"Is it?!"

"HAHAHAHAHAHHAAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAH YES YES HAHAHAHAAHHAHAHAHAAHAHAHAHA!"

Brooke stops.

"Good."

She then trots off into the distance.

Kate wastes no time and darts out into the open.

She eyes the two tied up figures and decides to.................
125122112.title: Create a distraction

choices: All three are caught in another booby trap
1251221121.content:
...............help them.

Cautiously tiptoeing over, Katie whispers to the two captives.

"I bought us some time. She'll be back in a few minutes. I'm going to untie you and we'll make a break for it. Nod if you're willing to go along."

Both people nod.

Deftly, Katie unties to the two captives, who drop silently to the ground and remove their blindfolds. They both hug Katie in gratitude.

"We'll have time for that later." Katie whispered. "What are your names?"

"Jaime." the man replied.

"Tammy." the girl answered.

"Okay. I need you to follow me, I know where we can hold up for a while."

Motioning for them to follow, the three make their way over to the cart path.

What happens next?
1251221121.title: Untie them

12512211211.content:
Luckily, the three are able to make their way down the cart path and exit the woods.

As they stand at the entrance, wondering what to do next, Katie notices that Jaime and Tammy are without their shoes.

"You guys need place to rest until we can get your shoes back. Quick, my house isn't far."

Obediently, the two captives follow Katie to her home, where they frantically run inside and lock the door.

Resting on the sofas in her living room, Katie asks the question that's been on her mind for a while.

"How did that happen to you guys?"

Tammy answered.

"Jaime and I always meet up to go for walks in the morning. Today we happened to take a new route and saw those three women robbing someone else's house. We thought we could get away, but they were too quick. They were gonna tickle us until we agreed to stay silent."

"They probably wouldn't have tickled us," Jaime lamented, "if you hadn't been tickling me when we were walking."

"Is that how they spotted you?" Katie asked.

Jaime nodded.

"Yes. I was the first one off the path and let Tammy walk behind me. That's when I felt her hands go up my sweater and start tickling my sides. She always does that. My belly's way too ticklish and she knows it. Unfortunately that's when we got spotted and that's how they knew to tickle us."

Tammy laughed.

"Well maybe next time don't stretch like that in front of me."

She turned to Katie.

"He decided to raise his arms to stretch and his sweater rose up. I could see his belly. How did he not expect me to tickle?"

She turned back to Jaime.

"Here raise your arms."

Jaime did and sure enough his sweater rose above his bellybutton. Tammy dug into his bare sides immediately.

"See? It's way to easy."

"Hahahahahahahh stop it stop it ahahahahhahahahahahaahahaha!"

Tammy scribbled her nails all over his belly.

"Forgive me Jaime?"

"Hahahahahaha yes yes ahahahahahahahahah i give i give hahahahahhahahaha."

Tammy stopped. Jaime clutched his sides and curled up on the couch.

Katie smiled in relief that all three were okay. Then she decided to................
12512211211.title: They successfully exit the woods

125122112113.content:
Katie yawned deeply. After all the excitement from the morning, she'd forgotten she hadn't slept that well.

"I'm gonna head upstairs for second. Make yourselves at home and when I come back down, we can figure out how to get you guys back home."

Katie headed upstairs to her room and collapsed on the bed. As soon as her head hit the pillow her eyelids fell shut.

After what seemed like hours, Katie was roused awake.

It was coming from downstairs.

What was it?
125122112113.title: Go upstairs for a nap

1251221121131.content:
Katie slowly got out of bed and tiptoed to the edge of the stairs.

The sound was hysterical laughter.

Katie crept down the stairs to find the source of the sound.

As she peered downstairs, she saw the laughing culprit was...........
1251221121131.title: Laughter

12512211211312.content:
.......Jaime. Again.

He was being tickled by Tammy on his...........
12512211211312.title: Jaime

info.brief_description: A girl who gets into all types of ticklish/tickling situations, any part of the year
info.description:
This story is going to be about a girl named Kate who is 14 years old and just enter high school and very ticklish. Kate finds herself in many different types of tickling situations. Kate is into sports and is in very good shape. She is on the high school woman's soccer team and likes to go for runs in the woods right behind her house. she also does not know about the tickling situations she will encounter.

Her outfits are usually small shirts also crop tops and jeans and yoga pants and her Pajamas are usually a tank top and pajamas bottoms.

Her ticklish spots going from the most to the least are her belly, belly button, ribs, underarms, thighs, and feet.

For the situations she encounters, they can be anything from her boyfriend tickling to her a tickling Witch that uses tickle spells to a tickling carnival. You can get as creative as you want. Also you can pick a season or a holiday or any part of the year you want. like summer can be "4th of July", Labor day, a summer vacation to a tickle town. Winter can be Christmas time and new year eve with all types of tickling situations from meeting Santa Claus to anything. Fall can be Halloween and thanksgiving. spring can be Easter, St. Patrick's day and spring break. So get as creative as you want. You decide on the Adventure you want her to go on and how the tickling goes.

Rules:
I made this story 13+, which means clothes stay on. she can wear crop tops and a bathing suit, but can not be naked. I will delete the chapter. must be fully clothed.
No swearing
no Killing
no guy tickling
no gay stuff
keep it clean. thank you

one other thing, chapters need a paragraph or two long. each paragraph needs to be at least 5 sentences

lastly get creative and have fun
info.pretty_title: A day in the life of a ticklish Girl
